section.title: Description
section.p: "An association between an Act and a Role with an Entity playing that Role. Each Entity (in a Role) involved in an Act in a certain way is linked to the act by one Participation-instance." - HL7 V3. This class contains the minimal data (date/time, comments, and a pointer to IndividualProvider) that is most commonly needed for participations that involve and entity playing the role of Practitioner.

stentry.p: "Contains any comments or notes made by the practitioner in reference to the action in which they participated." - HL7 V3.
"An interval of time specifying the time during which the participant is involved in the act through this Participation." - HL7 V3.

Represents information about a person who is authorized to provide health care services in the role of practitioner for a health care provider organization. The role of practitioner includes all functions performed for a health care provider organization in order to provide patient care and treatment.
